fields.description:
Android is the only platform that doesn't support Ti.UI.ActivityIndicator's indicatorColor and indicatorDiameter properties. We should ideally support it for parity's sake.

http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/api/Titanium.UI.ActivityIndicator-property-indicatorDiameter
fields.summary: Android: Support indicatorColor and indicatorDiameter properties on Ti.UI.ActivityIndicator

comments.body:
Verified improvement with the test case provided in https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/8529 , Was able to change the indicator color from blue to red {{activityIndicator.setIndicatorColor('red');}} but was not able to verify changes in the diameter for {{indicatorDiameter}}. Is their a reason for this [~gmathews]?
*Environment*
{code:java}
Appcelerator Command-Line Interface, version 6.1.0
Nexus 6P (Android version 7.1.1)
Operating System Name: Mac OS X El Capitan
Operating System Version: 10.11.6
Node.js Version: 4.6.0
npm: 4.2.8
Titanium SDK Version: 6.1.0.v20170115172707
Xcode: 8.2
Appcelerator Studio: 4.8.1.201612050850
{code}
[~smohammed] Yes, {{indicatorDiameter}} is only supported on MobileWeb.
Alright Thanks, Closing ticket as {{activityIndicator.setIndicatorColor}} is working as indicated above.
